New Paper: "Democracy and Social Equality"

Posted on October 26, 2022

My paper “Democracy and Social Equality” has now appeared at JESP. It is available here: https://jesp.org/index.php/jesp/article/view/1890. This is the first of my new work in political philosophy. Thanks to the reviewers and editors at JESP for all their hard work bringing the paper to print.
